title: Ruling Showcases Checks and Balances - WSJ

organizations.name: ninth u.s. circuit court of appeals

text:
Ruling Showcases Checks and Balances President faces additional political risks if he prolongs the battle over his travel ban By @peterwsj Feb. 9, 2017 9:37 p.m. ET 
WASHINGTON—A federal appellate court ruling blocking President Donald Trump’s immigration ban sent a powerful message about the balance of power enshrined in the Constitution establishing three equal branches of government, a system that will serve as a check on his presidency just as it does on any other. 
The three-judge panel at the Ninth U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals in San Francisco also delivered a withering blow to a central... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
